```{r include=F}
teaching_tb <- read.csv("../Data/Teaching.csv") %>%
  dplyr::mutate_all(remove_commmas)
```
```{r teaching}
teaching_tb %>% 
      dplyr::mutate(Role_Inst = paste0(Role,", ",Institution)) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = Role_Inst,
    when = Year,
    with = Course,#Author,
    where = Location,#Role
    .protect = TRUE)
```
